⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[RngHomo]c2)↔((c1 ∈ Rng ∧ c2 ∈ Rng)∧(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧ c0 ∈(c3[MgmHom]c4))))
⊣ c3 =(mulGrp ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(mulGrp ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, crngh, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c3, cmgmhm, c4)))

comment: A non-unital ring homomorphism is a homomorphism of multiplicative magmas. (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
